sense.def:
To stroke someone or something
pomeni potegniti roko počasi in narahlo po nekom ali nečem.

seg.quote: She put out a hand and stroked the cat.

sense.def:
A stroke
je hudo nenadno bolezensko stanje, ki prizadene možgane in je pogosto vzrok za smrt ali ohromelost ene strani telesa.

seg.quote: She had a stroke and was unable to walk again.

sense.def:
The strokes of a pen or brush
so premiki roke pri pisanju ali slikanju oziroma sledi na papirju, ki jih pri tem pusti pisalo ali čopič.

seg.quote: She began to paint with bold, defiant strokes.

sense.def:
Strokes
so pri plavanju ali veslanju ponavljajoči se premiki rok ali vesel.

A swimming stroke
je posebna vrsta ali način plavanja.

The strokes of a clock
so zvoki ure, ki označujejo polno uro.

seg.quote: At the twelfth stroke, we welcomed in the New Year.

sense.def:
A stroke of luck
je nekaj, kar se nam zgodi nepričakovano in nas osreči.
A stroke of genius
je nenadna zamisel ali navdih.

seg.quote: Then it came, my stroke of great good fortune.
Her idea was a stroke of genius.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
at a stroke
ali
in one stroke
, se zgodi nenadoma in v celoti zaradi enega samega dejanja.

cit.quote: z eno potezo, v eni potezi

seg.quote: He was determined at a stroke to remove those distinctions.

sense.def:
Not to do a stroke of work
pomeni biti zelo len;
